name: clanker-cli
description: Glitchcore agent harness with planner, slaves, judge, and dashboard stream.

scripts.test:it:stub: CLANKER_IT_MODE=stub yarn build && CLANKER_IT_MODE=stub NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules yarn jest --config jest.it.config.cjs --reporters=summary
scripts.test:it:real: CLANKER_IT_MODE=real CLANKER_IT_MAX_MS=240000 yarn build && CLANKER_IT_MODE=real CLANKER_IT_MAX_MS=240000 NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules yarn jest --config jest.it.config.cjs --testTimeout=240000 --runInBand --openHandlesTimeout=5000 --reporters=summary
scripts.test:it:real:debug: CLANKER_IT_MODE=real CLANKER_IT_MAX_MS=240000 CLANKER_IT_DEBUG=1 yarn build && CLANKER_IT_MODE=real CLANKER_IT_MAX_MS=240000 CLANKER_IT_DEBUG=1 NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules yarn jest --config jest.it.config.cjs --testTimeout=240000 --runInBand --openHandlesTimeout=5000 --detectOpenHandles --reporters=summary
scripts.verify: yarn format:write && yarn typecheck && yarn test && yarn test:it
